SV020.SV020_Area500_Talk_Intro_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal21"/][UE:Meta key="c3dc733b2f014a3095d621dc74e2944a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]I'm [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal21"/]Twyla[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I appreciate your help.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="c3dc733b2f014a3095d621dc74e2944a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly"/]I came here as a geologist with the
research task force,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but frankly,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I can't
get off this planet fast enough.
SV020.SV020_Area500_Talk_Outro_T01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal21"/][UE:Meta key="5d638cc9f85c44c497da391a0daede5a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Oh my,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] don't you look fine in that space
suit.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] You look a whole lot like me![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="5d638cc9f85c44c497da391a0daede5a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="AngryFaceOnly2"/]Wait...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]what did I just say?!
SV020.SV020_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal21"/][UE:Meta key="8e8563739ffd409e9bc23baf9ca9d653" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Excuse me,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but maybe you could try not to
get my clothes dirty?
SV020.SV020_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal21"/][UE:Meta key="86ec598b50574aafa4c32d2e2d46dd71" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]You are rather adept at digging,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
aren't you?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="86ec598b50574aafa4c32d2e2d46dd71" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YareFaceOnly"/]If you promise to try not to get dirt on me,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
I might have a use for those excavation
skills of yours.
SV020.SV020_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal21"/][UE:Meta key="c0263589b69744adb1198f6a37ffb441" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]I'm always surprised to see the beautiful
things nature makes,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] like raw materials.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="c0263589b69744adb1198f6a37ffb441" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]There are still so many things to discover
in this universe,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] aren't there?
SV020.SV020_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal21"/][UE:Meta key="dd5b804330c14a388b6acbe3d89a5662" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]The other day,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf11"/]Komo[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] asked me to give her
a private lecture about my research.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="dd5b804330c14a388b6acbe3d89a5662" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]In her water-quality surveying,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the
erosion of sedimentary rock due to a
river's movement is very important.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="dd5b804330c14a388b6acbe3d89a5662" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]That's what I said,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] anyway.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm not sure
how accurate it was,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] since I made it up as
I went.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's probably fine...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Right?
SV020.SV020_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal21"/][UE:Meta key="52557acf92654f4695abd3ba3e67dd88" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]In our surveys,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf11"/]Komo[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] and I discovered
that the planet's soil has water-purifying
properties![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="52557acf92654f4695abd3ba3e67dd88" Scale="1"/]Can you believe my research was actually
useful for once?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="52557acf92654f4695abd3ba3e67dd88" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]You know what I realized?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] With everything
I've learned,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the work I've done up to now
hasn't all been in vain.
SV020.SV020_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal21"/][UE:Meta key="5bf633c2c917487caacd368e87c0f32e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal16"/]Keesh[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] asks me a lot of things about
geology.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] If I don't know the answer,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
I've started being honest about it.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="5bf633c2c917487caacd368e87c0f32e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]I realized that I'm still in the midst of my
education too.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Going forward,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I feel like
we have an opportunity to learn together.
SV020.SV020_Area500_Talk_Hint_03_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal21"/][UE:Meta key="fc880c6158eb4f0d8670691e61a9b721" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]It's somewhat overwhelming here because
the natural environment is so different,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
but that means there's research to do.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="fc880c6158eb4f0d8670691e61a9b721" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]We have a great opportunity to study this
strange planet!
SV020.SV020_Area500_Talk_Hint_03_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal21"/][UE:Meta key="30e217b5996b4e8697b23aec2c4ccdbf" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf11"/]Komo[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] is so sincere about everything.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
She even listens attentively when I talk.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="30e217b5996b4e8697b23aec2c4ccdbf" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]I love hearing what she has to say too.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
She's become an irreplaceable friend.
SV020.SV020_Area500_Talk_Hint_03_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal21"/][UE:Meta key="d1ecbbbd9e714e38924aaf4da75b8216" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]My professor encouraged me to come on
this expedition,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but I feel like I'm starting
to understand his reasoning now.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d1ecbbbd9e714e38924aaf4da75b8216" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]I think he was trying to tell me to go out
and get some real-world experience.
SV020.SV020_Area500_Talk_Hint_03_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal21"/][UE:Meta key="82983186c3b547f0a5edf0cc6332d92d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]I'm always surprised to see the beautiful
things nature makes,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] like raw materials.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="82983186c3b547f0a5edf0cc6332d92d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]There are still so many things to discover
in this universe,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] aren't there?
SV020.SV020_Area500_Talk_Hint_03_05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal21"/][UE:Meta key="fb7f594f96c74a49aa5891c9625f3192" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]In our surveys,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf11"/]Komo[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] and I discovered
that the planet's soil has water-purifying
properties![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="fb7f594f96c74a49aa5891c9625f3192" Scale="1"/]Can you believe my research was actually
useful for once?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="fb7f594f96c74a49aa5891c9625f3192" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]You know what I realized?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] With everything
I've learned,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the work I've done up to now
hasn't all been in vain.
SV020.SV020_Area500_Talk_Hint_03_06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal21"/][UE:Meta key="a541d906ea804fc0b83a471e3e8f3992" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal16"/]Keesh[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] asks me a lot of things about
geology.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] If I don't know the answer,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
I've started being honest about it.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="a541d906ea804fc0b83a471e3e8f3992" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]I realized that I'm still in the midst of my
education too.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Going forward,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I feel like
we have an opportunity to learn together.
SV020.SV020_Area500_Talk_Scenario_Hint_01_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal21"/][UE:Meta key="5afca000bf564cfb9a76abf3bf36666b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]The planet is composed of layers.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] The
viscous mantle beneath the outer crust
causes it to shift,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] collide,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and uplift...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="5afca000bf564cfb9a76abf3bf36666b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ObieFaceOnly"/]It's unnerving to think that the land moves.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
That would be unheard of back home![etc:Wait frame="15"/] What
an awesome and terrifying planet!
SV020.SV020_Area500_Talk_Scenario_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal21"/][UE:Meta key="003bb64f5b7547ebbffa43c2e9c7dd34" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]When I agreed to join the research task
force,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I really thought I was ready for
something like this.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="003bb64f5b7547ebbffa43c2e9c7dd34" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly2"/]I never dreamed that my knowledge of
geology would be so inapplicable on
this planet.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="003bb64f5b7547ebbffa43c2e9c7dd34" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]I feel as if my professor may have urged
me to join the task force to try to teach
me some kind of lesson.
SV020.SV020_Area500_Talk_Scenario_Hint_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal21"/][UE:Meta key="b3d70c2e30ce46e19c779bb8c1629e03" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]I just want to look at pretty rocks and
sand in my lab while pondering the
geological history that creates a planet.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b3d70c2e30ce46e19c779bb8c1629e03" Scale="1"/]I have no desire to dig around outside.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
My clothes and hands get dirty![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Ugh...[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
It is seriously the worst!
SV020.SV020_Area500_Talk_Scenario_Hint_01_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal21"/][UE:Meta key="6fd596fd14334daea128ea8866afd0ac" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Ugh![etc:Wait frame="8"/] I simply can't understand the others
in the research task force.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6fd596fd14334daea128ea8866afd0ac" Scale="1"/]They go on like they don't even know we're
shipwrecked![etc:Wait frame="15"/] How can they possibly be so
calm at a time like this?
SV020.SV020_Area500_Talk_Scenario_Hint_01_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal21"/][UE:Meta key="2358606ee9f54a9380a393823e51154c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]That student—[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal16"/]Keesh[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I think it was—keeps
asking geology questions I don't know the
answers to.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="2358606ee9f54a9380a393823e51154c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly"/]I've been giving her the slip by making up
random excuses for why I can't chat,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but
what do I do if she keeps coming to me?
SV020.SV020_Area500_Talk_Scenario_Hint_02_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal21"/][UE:Meta key="f6088808a4a649a1af1212b22946d91e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf11"/]Komo[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s been found too?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Oh thank
goodness![etc:Wait frame="8"/] And I truly mean that.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f6088808a4a649a1af1212b22946d91e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]Even though she's shy like me,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] when I was
feeling alone in the task force,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] she went
out of her way to come speak to me.
